name: Wizabeasts
storyline: You moved to Chademars to attend the prestigious Oscar's Academy, an academy that helps develop the battle skills of commanders! Graduates of Oscar's Academy can look forward to a very lucrative career! The one big downside of attending Oscar's Academy is that it costs $5,000,000... This debt gets reduced by defeating club champions in battle. Defeating 1 club champion drops student debt to $2,000,000, defeating 2 club champions drops student debt to $1,000,000, and so on. You'll also have to worry about and help stop the increasingly dangerous Plume Gang. Plume Gang steal Wizabeasts, show a suspicious interest in cart research, and seem to be plotting something. You're also having recurring dreams that appear to have connections to events in the past and present... During your adventure, you will meet several characters like the snobby rich rival Edward and the friendly aspiring baker Cara.
summary: Wizabeasts is a monster-taming RPG with tactical battles! Uncover a mystery from the past, take down a dangerous gang, and get your student debt forgiven by defeating club champions!
